content: Just beyond the clearing where you'll fight the Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai, you'll also find The Crag Meditation Spot. You can get this before or after the fight. Just before it, there's another Purple Lingzhi that can be harvested -- don't worry, this won't be another enemy.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Ashen Pass III' and the sub-subsection 'Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai'.
The content is as follows:
Just beyond the clearing where you'll fight the Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai, you'll also find The Crag Meditation Spot. You can get this before or after the fight. Just before it, there's another Purple Lingzhi that can be harvested -- don't worry, this won't be another enemy.
